org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.client

Class HelloHBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.client.HelloHBase

  • public final class HelloHBase
extends Object
    Successful running of this application requires access to an active instance of HBase. For install instructions for a standalone instance of HBase, please refer to https://hbase.apache.org/book.html#quickstart

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void createNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#createNamespace and Admin#createTable to create a namespace with a table that has one column-family.
      (package private) static void deleteNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#disableTable, Admin#deleteTable, and Admin#deleteNamespace to disable/delete Table and delete Namespace.

      Checks to see whether a namespace exists.
      (package private) static void putRowToTable(Table table)
      Invokes Table#put to store a row (with two new columns created 'on the fly') into the table.

      • putRowToTable

        static void putRowToTable(Table table)
                   throws IOException
        Invokes Table#put to store a row (with two new columns created 'on the fly') into the table.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException - If IO problem encountered
